control.name: gridLookUpEdit1
control.description: The GridLookUpEdit control provides lookup functionality using a dropdown XtraGrid control.

control.name: dataNavigator1
control.description: Both the GridLookUpEdit and DataNavigator controls are bound to the Order_Details data table.

control.name: gridControl1
control.description: The Customer and Employee columns use GridLookUpEdit controls as in-place editors.

control.name: icbTextEditStyle
control.description: Specifies the style in which text is displayed and edited in the editor.

control.name: ceImmediatePopup
control.description: Specifies whether the popup window is displayed immediately after an end-user has typed a character in the edit box.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: Specifies whether the popup window is sizable.

control.name: ceShowPopupFooter
control.description: Specifies whether the dropdown window footer is visible.

control.name: ceShowAutoFilterRow
control.description: Specifies whether the auto filter row is displayed.

control.name: ceShowColumnHeaders
control.description: Specifies whether column headers are displayed.

control.name: ceShowIndicator
control.description: Specifies whether the row indicator panel is displayed.

control.name: ceShowHorzLines
control.description: Specifies whether horizontal grid lines are displayed.

control.name: ceShowVerticalLines
control.description: Specifies whether vertical grid lines are displayed.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceEvenRow
control.description: Specifies whether even rows are painted using appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.EvenRow property.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceOddRow
control.description: Specifies whether odd rows are painted using appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.OddRow property.

control.name: ceAutoComplete
control.description: In auto completion mode, the text in the edit box is automatically completed if it matches a DisplayMember field value of one of dropdown rows.
